project_name.justification: The authoritative project name is Huber Heights, and the text refers to the 'Huber Heights Property'. For example: 'Panther Minerals entered into the Agreement with an arm’s length purchaser (the “Purchaser”) for the Huber Heights Property located in Nevada, USA.'

ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is an unnamed 'arm’s length purchaser'. The CEO mentioned, 'Mr. Robert Birmingham, Chief Executive Officer', is the CEO of the seller, Panther Minerals Inc.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: This agreement grants the Purchaser the exclusive right to acquire up to a 100% undivided interest in the property, subject to a 2% net smelter royalty (NSR).
